topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546b6ba86368725263ed0100#post_546b6ba86368725263ed0100
I've actually had this very same argument with someone that was going for criminology for using the internet to catch terrorists; basically he was studying to work for the nsa/department of defense or such and after about thirty minutes of him trying to bullshit me and eventually him realizing that I wasn't stupid he just outright opened up and said flat out, "Since you're not stupid and you're not falling for it no we totally can't catch criminals and no we can't catch terrorists before attacks or crimes happen, but the reason why we have to bullshit everyone constantly is that if people realize this then everyone in the entire industry would be instantly out of a job".

The boston marathon bombing massively illustrated the problem that they can't prevent terrorist attacks because actual terrorists have stopped using the internet to communicate and lone wolfs are unstoppable.  If there was another 9/11 the only reason why it couldn't happen again is that the air force now has orders to if a plane is hijacked by terrorists to shoot down the plane if they refuse to land.

I would not be surprised if the nsa and such years down the line gets de-funded.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546b6fbd6368724ff5350000#post_546b6fbd6368724ff5350000

It went pretty normal... Until that second-to-last sentence.

Now, this is more in tie with my usual naiveness so to speak, but how the heck do you tell the people "We killed everyone on that plane"

I know it's security and priorities, but still, how do you justify that? In National TV no less.

>Everyone on that plane was a major threat?
>There were no civilians aboard and those documents and luggage were falsified by the terrorists?

How?!
topics.author: 4fdfbf92945b7075d50036e4

topics.body:
"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546b72686368727e45400100#post_546b72686368727e45400100
I don't think they would justify it; if it were to ever happen chances are everyone involved, the one who gave the order and the president would step down because there would be no way of politically justifying it.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/546b73e06368721e3e9d0000#post_546b73e06368721e3e9d0000

If it was in this country, that not only would happen, but the responsables would still be on their posts, they would never put one single foot in jail, they would keep living from the taxes the people pays and then die happily... Oh wait, that did happened.

topics.body:
so uuuuh.

i just swallowed like one of those fish bones, like iunno what is called but i swallowed it.

then it got stuck in my throat, it hurt but fortunely it didint cut my breath.

after a round of trying to spit it, vomit it, swallow it or whatever it did first, it involved a lot of rather painful moments.

by the time i managed to swallow it whole i started seeing like small moving stars everywhere flying around.
 
just little multicolored rainbow star dots flying all around my sight.

[spoiler]I should just change my name.[/spoiler]
